data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Mark: So, let's get the seafood platter. I ____ really ____ some ____!
Katy: You ____ fish, don't ____?
Mark: Not ____ fish! Some ____ are ____ delicious. You ____ it, don't ____?
Katy: It's ____ with ____. Let's have some fries too.
data.partBlankContent:
Mark: So, let's get the seafood platter. I co___ really e__ some fi__!
Katy: You ha__ fish, don't y__?
Mark: Not a__ fish! Some ki___ are rea___ delicious. You li__ it, don't y__?
Katy: It's fi__ with m_. Let's have some fries too.
data.fullContent: Mark: So, let's get the seafood platter. I could really eat some fish! Katy: You hate fish, don't you? Mark: Not any fish! Some kinds are really delicious. You like it, don't you? Katy: It's fine with me. Let's have some fries too.
data.answer: 马克:那我们就吃海鲜拼盘吧。我真想吃鱼! 凯蒂:你讨厌鱼，不是吗? 马克:不是所有的鱼!有些真的很好吃。你喜欢它，不是吗? 凯蒂:我不介意。我们也吃点薯条吧。
